short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An end-to-end agent based copilot for recruiting which helps streamline your whole hiring process!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
qode.world is an innovative Copilot for Recruiting that leverages AI to streamline the recruitment process, predicting your next action to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.

qode.world allows you to find the most relevant candidates, automate interviews and assessments with AI recruiters, and create comprehensive candidate profiles with contact information, all while maintaining organized private talent pools.

AI-POWERED CANDIDATE SOURCING:
Let AI agent work & match your job descriptions across billions of data points to find the most relevant candidates, saving you time and effort.

AI INTERVIEWER:
Use your very own multi-lingual AI recruiter to conduct live interviews and assessments. This enables you to screen more candidates efficiently and make better hiring decisions.

360-DEGREE CANDIDATE PROFILE:
Combine billions of data points using AI to give you unique insights about candidates. Access comprehensive profiles including contact information such as email addresses and phone numbers.

PRIVATE TALENT POOL:
Create and maintain private talent pools with the best candidates. No more spreadsheets and disparate ATS systems. Your candidate pool is yours to keep forever, neatly organized and powered by AI.

qode.world FREE Extension:
- Free Candidate profile views
- Free Contact credits
- Free AI Interviewers
- Free Private Talent Pool with unlimited number of profiles

WHY qode.world:
- All details are searched and enriched in real-time.
- High hit rate for finding relevant candidates.
- Pioneer in AI Interviewer
- Trusted by industry leaders.

WHO IS IT FOR?
- Recruitment professionals
- Headhunters
- Hiring managers


Website: www.qode.world
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/qode-world/

Please contact us if you need any support at: contact@qode.world
